unpublishedAction.name: set_customerprice
invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
jsonPathKeys:
appsmith.store.newList.map((d) => { 	
			return"(" + "(SELECT \"Id\" FROM \"Products\" WHERE \"ProductDescription\" = '" + d.productDesc + "' )," + "(SELECT \"Id\" FROM \"Customers\" WHERE \"OrgID\" = '" + d.orgID + "' ))"}).join(",")
